entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Caribou
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Caribou Point 7:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -10

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:21 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 7:21 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
